creditline: Gift of Richard L. Simmons in honor of Lotus Stack
description: shaped skull cap (very stiff), covered with geometric designs in tarnished gold thread; on top, irregular four sided figure with circular motif in center; irregular lines of stitching surround rectangle; two rows follow edge of top; sides diamonds and triangles; two rows stitching along bottom edge; wide maroon leather band inside at bottom; foam insert
title: Hat
